content.text:
# Revolutionary Communist Party of Turkey – Socialist Unity

Revolutionary Communist Party of Turkey – Socialist Unity () was a clandestine Marxist-Leninist political party in Turkey. It was founded in 1987, following a split from the Revolutionary Communist Party of Turkey (TDKP). It was dissolved in 1990.
See also
*List of illegal political parties in Turkey
*Communist Party of Turkey (disambiguation), for other groups using similar names
References
